title: Big Data Helps The Celtics Win (Audio)
itunes:title: Big Data Helps The Celtics Win (Audio)
description:
Scarlet Fu and Mike Lynch sit down with Boston Celtics Assistant General Manager Mike Zarren and Hudl COO Matt Mueller to find out why 29 of 30 NBA teams rely on Sportscode for performance analytics. We learn what kind of data Hudl collects, why it’s so popular and the ways teams are using it to gain an edge on the court. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
